summary: New tattoo set for UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
Previous versions here:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28651]Set 1[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28836]Set 2[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29127]Set 3[/url]


=============

Terms: You can freely modify/re-upload the resources included in this mod, no permission necessary. File provided as-is, no support will be provided on this mod.

=============

UPDATE 1:

Added couple more shots, tattoos look much better under the right lighting condition.


==========


A set of tattoos designed around couple new outfits.


As requested, I included the psd file with the archive, along with an all-in-one dds file for those who prefer not to have to deal with Photoshop/GIMP.


=============


Installation: (These WILL override my V1/2/3 designs, unless you use the psd)

Download, extract, backup original, and replace original.




Uninstallation:

Remove femalebody_1.dds, restore original.
author: Elewin
